titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: DECISION TO TREAT DATE (SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY DRUG REGIMEN) - Also Known As

body.p: This data element is also known by these names:

strow.stentry: DECISION TO TREAT DATE (ANTI-CANCER DRUG REGIMEN)
DECISION TO TREAT DATES (SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY DRUG REGIMEN)
